text: John Marsden (27 September 1950 â€“ 18 December 2024) was an Australian writer and educator. He wrote more than 40 books in his career. He was known for his young adult novel, Tomorrow, When the War Began. He began writing for children while working as a teacher. His first book, So Much to Tell You, was published in 1987. Marsden died at his home in Romsey, Australia on 18 December 2024, at the age of 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Australian educators Category:Writers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Australian novelists
